channel.title: flyio on Khalid's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in flyio on Khalid's Blog

item.title: Serverless/FAAS Providers With No Credit Card Required
item.description: Have you ever been in a situation where you met a strange girl, asking her out for an easy walk in a sunny afternoon, introduce each other, giving your number, email, Facebook, Github account, even your home address, and then suddenly she’s asking you for a credit card, she said, it’s for our good, I won’t do evil.
